document.title: Pellete de liens du 05-09-2005
document.author: NiKo
document.text:
vnc2swf - Screen Recorder nc2swf is a screen recorder for Flash movie. It captures screen motion through VNC protocol and converts it into a Shockwave Flash (SWF) file. (Tags: tools flash demo linux softs screencap screenrecording )
xajax PHP Class Library - The easiest way to develop asynchronous Ajax applications with PHP xajax is an open source PHP class library that allows you to easily create powerful, web-based, Ajax applications using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and PHP. (Tags: javascript php framework ajax )
phpCodeGenie - Database Driven Applications Code Generator ( via ) phpCodeGenie (PCG) is a code generator (MDS) for database driven applications. (Tags: php mysql sql oracle lib mda )
Code Generation Network - Generators for PHP Outils de generation automatique de code pour PHP. (Tags: php uml softs mda )
Le Web et le FTP en console Client FTP en ligne de commande tres simple et efficace. (Tags: ftp cli )
